content: through the front loop of the stitches on the front side of the tube and back loops of the stitches on the other side of the tube slip_stitch tube closed on one end finish off 5 turn tube over to other end join yarn with a slip_stitch in first st of one side chain 1 and repeat the last row on other end finish off leaving a long tail for joining 6 - note - use photos below to help with folding and stacking the ends together to make the knotted part of your headband this next part might sound confusing but it s really simple once you figure it out with your now closed tube laying flat on a table or other flat surface take the ends and fold them into a < on the left and a > on the right now take these and stack them so that they go in the following order bottom of the left bottom of the right top of the left top of the right this pattern is not to be sold or distributed without permission you may sell what you make using pattern but please make sure to give credit for the pattern left side fold < right side fold > stack < and > 7 - finishing with the two sides stacked put your long tail onto your yarn needle and sew back and forth through what you have folded finish off weave in all ends take your headband and flip it right side out congratulations you ve finished your headband this pattern is not to be sold or distributed without permission you may sell what you make using pattern but please make sure to give credit for the pattern
